name: Square Escape (Mushi95)
description:
My first Unity game. You control the cube avoiding obstacles.
Mouse control left and right - movement of the cube.
Escape - exit the game
Keypad Enter - clear data (points and attempts).
Music:
ParagonX9 Infiltration - licensed under Creative Commons.
EspiDev Caliber - licensed under Creative Commons.
Alan Walker Force - Distributed by NCS.
In case of copyright issues, please contact me by email - mushiroom.98@gmail.com.
ATTENTION! In the past, my first account was hacked and my game was deleted. My first Mushi account. I can rarely sit in my account, so do not lose me. With respect your Mushi. :)
